QuestData.Title: Strongarm Tactics
QuestData.Description: Scouting reports from the Strongarm Airstrip are in, and I've underlined a few high-priority targets for you.$b$bTwo gnomish mechanics have been keeping Alliance gyrocopters in the air. Take out the mechanics, and the gyrocopters' numbers will dwindle.$b$bA dwarven death knight wanders their perimeter. He's an adventurer like yourself - loosely allied and highly dangerous.$b$bFinally, a name I recognize: Corporal Jackson Silver. He's a hero of the Alliance and a deadshot with a crossbow.$b$bGood luck, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Corporal Jackson Silver, Morgus Grimhatchet, and Master Mechanic Cogswing and Gyro-Engineer Lavenderp.

Objectives.Objective: Master Engineer Cogswing and Gyro-Mechanic Lavenderp slain
